Altbackup

bitbucket

Bitten Querying¶

altquery.py for trac.db querying¶

Warning

never use this on a live trac.db, always extract one from a backup tarball and query that

Usage:

  1. define envvar DBPATH to the path to the extracted trac.db (a 7 GB file)
  2. if no recent extraction, use altbackup.py extract_tracdb

Examples:

altquery.py last_by_slave
altquery.py step_times_byrev -s ALL

python version¶

Some commands use group_concat requiring a recent sqlite. The one that comes with py27 is suitable.

sub-commands¶

last_by_slave¶

[blyth@cms01 scm]$ ./altquery.py last_by_slave
